title: How to Fry Tofu

steps.headline: Heat a heavy pan or wok with a coating of vegetable oil until the oil is hot.
steps.description: Check by putting the end of a wooden spoon into the oil, if you see little bubbles coming out the oil is hot.

steps.headline: Cut the tofu into half inch to one inch cubes (based on personal taste) while the pan is heating.
Put tofu into the pan in batches.
Turn after a couple of minutes when the first side is crispy.
Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder and any other spices you like.
Drain on a plate with a piece of paper towel.

text: Heat a heavy pan or wok with a coating of vegetable oil until the oil is hot. Check by putting the end of a wooden spoon into the oil, if you see little bubbles coming out the oil is hot. Cut the tofu into half inch to one inch cubes (based on personal taste) while the pan is heating.  Put tofu into the pan in batches.  Turn after a couple of minutes when the first side is crispy.  Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder and any other spices you like.  Drain on a plate with a piece of paper towel.  Finished.
